headline: Pitchers Beware: Giancarlo Stanton Is Feeling Strong
snippet: The slugger has been dogged by injuries as a Yankee. But after a big postseason, and some changes to his workouts, he is expecting a big year.

headline: ‘Rebuild the Backbone of America’: Biden Unveils Infrastructure Plan
snippet: President Biden on Wednesday outlined his $2 trillion infrastructure plan that would rebuild and upgrade America’s physical infrastructure, funded primarily by an increase in corporate taxes.

headline: Deaths, stillbirths and pregnancy complications increased during the pandemic, studies show.
snippet: A review of 40 studies in 17 countries found that for many women during the pandemic, childbearing has been especially risky.

headline: Minnesota Court Ruling Fuels Calls to Change Sexual Assault Law
snippet: The state Supreme Court tossed out a man’s conviction on a third-degree sexual conduct charge because the woman he was accused of assaulting was “voluntarily intoxicated” at the time.
